```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(mdsr)
library(RMySQL)
```


```{r}
db <- dbConnect_scidb(dbname = "imdb")
```

```{r}
query <- "SELECT movie_id, COUNT(info), production_year, kind_id 
            FROM imdb.title
            LEFT JOIN movie_info ON title.id = movie_info.movie_id
            WHERE info_type_id = 3 AND kind_id = 1
            GROUP BY movie_id;"

db %>%
  dbGetQuery(query)
```
